column5: Come shop Wimberley-enjoy Spring and Summer in the Hill Country! Casa Blanca, our historic cottage on the Wimberley Square, is just steps from the restaurants, galleries, boutiques, & Blue Hole Park-all at the heart of town. A large kitchen, 2 bedrooms, 1 bath, hardwood floors & private yard-the best in town! Available for 1 night stays Sunday-Wednesday, 2 night minimums Thursday-Saturday and 3 night minimums on holidays.
column8: Casa Blanca on the Wimberley Square
